name: Spare the Dying
description: Choose a creature within range that has 0 Hit Points and isn't dead. The creature becomes Stable.
higherLevelsDescription: The range doubles when you reach levels 5 (30 feet), 11 (60 feet), and 17 (120 feet).

effects.special: A creature with 0 HP becomes stable.

engineHook.notes: Requires logic to set a character's status to 'stable'.
